Job Description: What will you be doing    Oversee rendering and optimizing performance of our website     Be continuously involved in feature update decisions     Take ownership to integrate new datasets, taking designs and prototypes and implementing them in HTML, CSS, JS     To suggest improvements either to our feature set or to our architecture     Involved in designing UI/UX decisions     Developer needs to be able to take complete responsibility for writing clean, well-designed, testable code     Who are we looking for    2 4 years of hands on experience in front end development     Experience in helping organizations scale websites during rapid growth     Experience working in HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Jquery     Basic knowledge of JS framework like Angular/ReactJS is desirable but optional     Knowledge of style sheet language like Sass/Less is helpful but optional     Familiarity with custom template language (Django) is desirable, will have to learn on the job if not already familiar
